long_description: This assortment of Nite Ize Gear Ties is made of a sturdy, colorful rubber with an strong bendable interior wire. They wrap, tie and organize cords, devices and tools with a simple twist. Includes three 3 in., three 4 in., two 12 in., two 18 in. and two 24 in. ties. Keep your jumper cables, extension cords, dog leashes and electric cords neat and untangled. Nite Ize Gear Ties are also great for looping and hanging lightweight tools and lanterns. Tough and nonmarking rubber shell is grippy, waterproof and UV-resistant.
short_description: This assortment of Nite Ize Gear Ties is made of a sturdy, colorful rubber with an strong bendable interior wire. They wrap, tie and organize cords, devices and tools with a simple twist.
